00025 // Direct Sound Component GUID    {47D4D946-62E8-11cf-93BC-444553540000}

00052 typedef struct _DSCAPS
00053 {
00054     DWORD       dwSize;
00055     DWORD       dwFlags;
00056     DWORD       dwMinSecondarySampleRate;
00057     DWORD       dwMaxSecondarySampleRate;
00058     DWORD       dwPrimaryBuffers;
00059     DWORD       dwMaxHwMixingAllBuffers;
00060     DWORD       dwMaxHwMixingStaticBuffers;
00061     DWORD       dwMaxHwMixingStreamingBuffers;
00062     DWORD       dwFreeHwMixingAllBuffers;
00063     DWORD       dwFreeHwMixingStaticBuffers;
00064     DWORD       dwFreeHwMixingStreamingBuffers;
00065     DWORD       dwMaxHw3DAllBuffers;
00066     DWORD       dwMaxHw3DStaticBuffers;
00067     DWORD       dwMaxHw3DStreamingBuffers;
00068     DWORD       dwFreeHw3DAllBuffers;
00069     DWORD       dwFreeHw3DStaticBuffers;
00070     DWORD       dwFreeHw3DStreamingBuffers;
00071     DWORD       dwTotalHwMemBytes;
00072     DWORD       dwFreeHwMemBytes;
00073     DWORD       dwMaxContigFreeHwMemBytes;
00074     DWORD       dwUnlockTransferRateHwBuffers;
00075     DWORD       dwPlayCpuOverheadSwBuffers;
00076     DWORD       dwReserved1;
00077     DWORD       dwReserved2;
00078 } DSCAPS, *LPDSCAPS;
00079

00081 {

00121 //
00122 #undef INTERFACE
00123 #define INTERFACE IDirectSound
00124 #ifdef _WIN32
00125 DECLARE_INTERFACE_( IDirectSound, IUnknown )
00126 {
00127     /*** IUnknown methods ***/
00128     STDMETHOD(QueryInterface) (THIS_ REFIID riid, LPVOID * ppvObj) PURE;
00129     STDMETHOD_(ULONG,AddRef) (THIS)  PURE;
00130     STDMETHOD_(ULONG,Release) (THIS) PURE;
00131     /*** IDirectSound methods ***/
00132 
00133     STDMETHOD( CreateSoundBuffer)(THIS_ LPDSBUFFERDESC, LPLPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER, IUnknown FAR *) PURE;
00134     STDMETHOD( GetCaps)(THIS_ LPDSCAPS ) PURE;
00135     STDMETHOD( DuplicateSoundBuffer)(THIS_ LPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER, LPLPDIRECTSOUNDBUFFER ) PURE;
00136     STDMETHOD( SetCooperativeLevel)(THIS_ HWND, DWORD ) PURE;
00137     STDMETHOD( Compact)(THIS ) PURE;
00138     STDMETHOD( GetSpeakerConfig)(THIS_ LPDWORD ) PURE;
00139     STDMETHOD( SetSpeakerConfig)(THIS_ DWORD ) PURE;
00140     STDMETHOD( Initialize)(THIS_ GUID FAR * ) PURE;
00141 };

00182     STDMETHOD(              Play)(THIS_ DWORD,DWORD,DWORD ) PURE;

00221 /*
00222  * Return Codes
00223  */
00224 
00225 #define DS_OK                           0
00226 
00227 /*
00228  * The call failed because resources (such as a priority level)
00229  *  were already being used by another caller.
00230  */
00231 #define DSERR_ALLOCATED                 MAKE_DSHRESULT( 10 )
00232 /*
00233  * The control (vol,pan,etc.) requested by the caller is not available.
00234  */
00235 #define DSERR_CONTROLUNAVAIL            MAKE_DSHRESULT( 30 )
00236 /*
00237  * An invalid parameter was passed to the returning function
00238  */
00239 #define DSERR_INVALIDPARAM              E_INVALIDARG
00240 /*
00241  * This call is not valid for the current state of this object
00242  */
00243 #define DSERR_INVALIDCALL               MAKE_DSHRESULT( 50 )
00244 /*
00245  * An undetermined error occured inside the DSound subsystem
00246  */
00247 #define DSERR_GENERIC                   E_FAIL
00248 /*
00249  * The caller does not have the priority level required for the function to
00250  * succeed.
00251  */
00252 #define DSERR_PRIOLEVELNEEDED           MAKE_DSHRESULT( 70 )
00253 /*
00254  * The DSound subsystem couldn't allocate sufficient memory to complete the
00255  * caller's request.
00256  */
00257 #define DSERR_OUTOFMEMORY               E_OUTOFMEMORY
00258 /*
00259  * The specified WAVE format is not supported
00260  */
00261 #define DSERR_BADFORMAT                 MAKE_DSHRESULT( 100 )
00262 /*
00263  * The function called is not supported at this time
00264  */
00265 #define DSERR_UNSUPPORTED               E_NOTIMPL
00266 /*
00267  * No sound driver is available for use
00268  */
00269 #define DSERR_NODRIVER                  MAKE_DSHRESULT( 120 )
00270 /*
00271  * This object is already initialized
00272  */
00273 #define DSERR_ALREADYINITIALIZED        MAKE_DSHRESULT( 130 )
00274 /*
00275  * This object does not support aggregation
00276  */
00277 #define DSERR_NOAGGREGATION             CLASS_E_NOAGGREGATION
00278 /*
00279  * The buffer memory has been lost, and must be Restored.
00280  */
00281 #define DSERR_BUFFERLOST                MAKE_DSHRESULT( 150 )
00282 /*
00283  * Another app has a higher priority level, preventing this call from
00284  * succeeding.
00285  */
00286 #define DSERR_OTHERAPPHASPRIO           MAKE_DSHRESULT( 160 )
00287 /*
00288  * The Initialize() member on the Direct Sound Object has not been
00289  * called or called successfully before calls to other members.
00290  */
00291 #define DSERR_UNINITIALIZED             MAKE_DSHRESULT( 170 )
